plot: A young girl, tormented by a demon-like monster, seeks the help of a close relative to her defeat it, the monster however is someone she least expected.
title: El Cuco
plot_es: A young girl, tormented by a demon-like monster, seeks the help of a close relative to her defeat it, the monster however is someone she least expected.
